author: pixelzone
long_description:
Adds a hubbar with the amount of life of the bosses, making their battle more interesting.
This mod only works with mobs created using the TenPlus1 "[Mobs redo](https://content.minetest.net/packages/TenPlus1/mobs/)" API... - BY : DuckGo / [PixelZone](https://codeberg.org/pixelzone) - LICENSE : MIT - TEXTURE : CC BY-SA 4.0 - depends = - optional_depends = nssm,forgotten_monsters,ethereal_bosses,livingnether,lottmobs,dmobs ---
name: boss_s_hudbar
short_description: Adds a hubbar with the amount of life of the bosses..
title: Boss'S Hudbar
